column3: “This stain is the bees pajamas. Chillin here with QDawg, enjoying the couch lock. Smells like menthols to the dot. 10 out of 10 would smoke again.”

“They say that power corrupts, and absolute power corrupts absolutely. Our research regarding that particular truism is inconclusive, but we can say that Sour Power OG certainly lives up to its name.

They also say that for every action, there is an equal and opposite reaction. This we can most certainly confirm, and would wish to similarly caution those who spend time with Sour Power OG.

Remember that power gained i...”
